name: EU NIS2 Directive
overview: Directive (EU) 2022/2555 on measures for a high common level of cybersecurity across the Union. Applies to essential and important entities across 18 sectors. Mandatory implementation by October 2024.

Risk_Management.description: Comprehensive risk management and security measures

NIS2-1.description: Risk management measures - Implement policies on risk analysis and information system security
NIS2-1.examples: Comprehensive risk assessment, Security policy implementation, Threat landscape analysis
NIS2-1.use_cases: Microsoft Defender for Cloud, CrowdStrike Falcon, Palo Alto Networks Prisma Cloud

NIS2-2.description: Incident handling - Establish incident response capabilities and procedures
NIS2-2.examples: 24/7 incident response, Automated threat detection, Incident coordination
NIS2-2.use_cases: ServiceNow Security Operations, IBM Resilient, Microsoft Sentinel

NIS2-3.description: Business continuity and crisis management - Ensure continuity of essential services
NIS2-3.examples: Disaster recovery planning, Service continuity, Crisis management
NIS2-3.use_cases: ServiceNow Business Continuity, IBM Resilient, MetricStream GRC

Supply_Chain_Security.description: Supply chain security and third-party risk management

NIS2-4.description: Supply chain security - Manage security risks in supply chains
NIS2-4.examples: Third-party risk assessment, Supply chain monitoring, Vendor compliance
NIS2-4.use_cases: Microsoft Purview, ServiceNow Vendor Risk Management, OneTrust Vendor Risk

Security_Development.description: Security in network and information systems acquisition, development and maintenance

NIS2-5.description: Security in network and information systems acquisition, development and maintenance
NIS2-5.examples: Secure development lifecycle, Code security analysis, DevSecOps implementation
NIS2-5.use_cases: Microsoft Azure DevOps, GitLab Security, SonarQube

Assessment_Training.description: Assessment effectiveness and cybersecurity training requirements

NIS2-6.description: Policies and procedures to assess the effectiveness of cybersecurity risk management measures
NIS2-6.examples: Regular security assessments, Vulnerability management, Compliance monitoring

NIS2-7.description: Basic cyber hygiene practices and cybersecurity training
NIS2-7.examples: Employee security training, Phishing simulation, Security awareness programs
NIS2-7.use_cases: KnowBe4, Proofpoint Security Awareness, Microsoft Security Training

NIS2-8.description: Human resources security, access control policies and asset management
NIS2-8.examples: Identity and access management, Privileged access control, Asset inventory
NIS2-8.use_cases: Microsoft Entra ID, Okta, SailPoint IdentityIQ
